message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a method for indoor localization of service robots using a monocular camera and a floor plan. This falls under the robotics (cs.RO) category. The method involves using a convolutional neural network for room layout edge extraction, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also mentions the use of a particle filter for pose estimation, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The neural network used for edge extraction is trained using a large dataset, which suggests the use of machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the practical applications of the proposed method for service robots, which falls under systems and control (cs.SY).
